TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit FormsAuthenticationTicket extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对票证的属性和值的访问，这些票证用于 Forms 身份验证对用户进行标识。

span.span: Provides access to properties and values of the ticket used with forms authentication to identify users.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于创建一个对象，表示窗体身份验证用于标识已经过身份验证的用户的身份验证票证。The class is used to create an object that represents the authentication ticket that is used by forms authentication to identify an authenticated user. 与加密的字符串存储在 cookie 或 URL 中，将转换的属性和值的窗体身份验证票证。The properties and values of a forms-authentication ticket are converted to and from an encrypted string that is stored in a cookie or in the URL. 类提供方法来创建一个字符串值，可以存储在 cookie 或从 URL 中。The class provides an method to create a string value that can be stored in a cookie or in the URL from a . 类还提供了方法来创建从窗体身份验证 cookie 或 URL 检索从加密的身份验证票证的对象。The class also provides a method to create a object from the encrypted authentication ticket retrieved from the forms-authentication cookie or the URL. 为当前经过身份验证的用户可以使用访问属性类。The for the current authenticated user can be accessed using the property of the class. 你可以访问当前通过强制转换为对象属性的当前作为类型。You can access the current object by casting the property of the current as type . ## Examples 下面的代码示例将存储的结果在 cookie 中使用的方法将用户重定向到从返回的 URL 和方法。The following code example stores the result of the method in a cookie using the and redirects the user to the URL returned from the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[FormsAuthenticationTicketClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormsAuthenticationTicketClass/CS/formsauthenticationticketclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormsAuthenticationTicketClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormsAuthenticationTicketClass/VB/formsauthenticationticketclassvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用 cookie 名和过期信息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a cookie name and expiration information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由此构造函数创建的对象将具有值设置为的值属性，值为 2，的当前日期和时间，值空值字符串 ("")，和设置为当前的本地日期和时间加上的值的值`timeout`参数。The object created by this constructor will have a value set to the value of the property, a value of 2, an value of the current local date and time, a value of an empty string (""), and an value that is set to the current local date and time plus the value of the `timeout` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > `userData` 参数不能为 `null`。The `userData` parameter cannot be `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将存储的结果在 cookie 中使用的方法属性和重定向到的 URL 用户返回从方法。The following code example stores the result of the method in a cookie using the property and redirects the user to the URL returned from the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 获取 Forms 身份验证票证的 Cookie 路径。

span.span: Gets the cookie path for the forms-authentication ticket.

value.span: Forms 身份验证票证的 Cookie 路径。

span.span: The cookie path for the forms-authentication ticket.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用不提供的构造函数创建`cookiePath`参数，属性返回的值属性; 否则，版本属性返回的值提供给构造函数。If the is created using a constructor that does not supply a `cookiePath` parameter, the property returns the value of the property; otherwise, the version property returns the value supplied to the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的属性值当前登录的用户。The following code example displays the property values of the for the current logged-on user. > [!NOTE] > 如果没有登录的用户，属性将为`null`并且尝试强制转换时，您将收到编译器异常属性作为对象。If there is no logged-on user, the property will be `null` and you will receive a compiler exception when attempting to cast the property as a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormsAuthenticationTicketProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormsAuthenticationTicketProperties/CS/formsauthenticationticketpropertiescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormsAuthenticationTicketProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormsAuthenticationTicketProperties/VB/formsauthenticationticketpropertiesvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用创建到期日期和时间，未提供参数的构造函数属性返回基于当前的本地日期和时间加上的值的值`timeout`提供给构造函数的参数。If the is created using the constructor that does not supply a parameter for an expiration date and time, the property returns a value based on the current local date and time plus the value of the `timeout` parameter supplied to the constructor. 如果使用的构造函数的创建`expiration`参数，属性返回的值提供给`expiration`参数。If the was created using a constructor that takes an `expiration` parameter, the property returns the value supplied to the `expiration` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的属性值当前登录的用户。The following code example displays the property values of the for the current logged-on user. > [!NOTE] > 如果没有登录的用户，属性将为`null`并且尝试强制转换时，您将收到编译器异常属性作为对象。If there is no logged-on user, the property will be `null` and you will receive a compiler exception when attempting to cast the property as a object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回`true`如果日期和时间是早于当前日期和时间; 否则为属性返回`false`。The property returns `true` if the date and time is less than the current local date and time; otherwise, the property returns `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的属性值当前登录的用户。The following code example displays the property values of the for the current logged-on user. > [!NOTE] > 如果没有登录的用户，属性将为`null`并且尝试强制转换时，您将收到编译器异常属性作为对象。If there is no logged-on user, the property will be `null` and you will receive a compiler exception when attempting to cast the property as a object. span.span: The when the forms-authentication ticket was originally issued.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示的本地日期和时间时颁发窗体身份验证票证。The property represents the local date and time when the forms-authentication ticket was issued. 方法使用属性值以确定是否日期和时间的窗体身份验证票证必须续订，并且还使用属性值以确定新日期和时间。The method uses the property value to determine whether the date and time of a forms-authentication ticket needs to be renewed and also uses the property value to determine the new date and time. 续订票证时，属性更新为本地日期和时间。When a ticket is renewed, the property is updated to the local date and time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的属性值当前登录的用户。The following code example displays the property values of the for the current logged-on user. > [!NOTE] > 如果没有登录的用户，属性将为`null`并且尝试强制转换时，您将收到编译器异常属性作为对象。If there is no logged-on user, the property will be `null` and you will receive a compiler exception when attempting to cast the property as a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormsAuthenticationTicketProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormsAuthenticationTicketProperties/CS/formsauthenticationticketpropertiescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormsAuthenticationTicketProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormsAuthenticationTicketProperties/VB/formsauthenticationticketpropertiesvb.aspx#1)]

The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用不提供的构造函数创建`userData`参数，属性返回一个空字符串 ("");否则，版本属性返回的值提供给构造函数。If the is created using a constructor that does not supply a `userData` parameter, the property returns an empty string (""); otherwise, the version property returns the value supplied to the constructor. 你可以使用属性来存储与其他用户信息不能由维护属性值。You can use the property to store additional user information with the that is not maintained by the property values. > [!NOTE] > 你应该限制中存储的数据量属性。You should limit the amount of data stored in the property. 你必须确保的大小属性不会导致 cookie 无效或过长的 URL。You must ensure that the size of the property does not result in an invalid cookie or an excessively long URL. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的属性值当前登录的用户。The following code example displays the property values of the for the current logged-on user. > [!NOTE] > 如果没有登录的用户，属性将为`null`并且尝试强制转换时，您将收到编译器异常属性作为对象。If there is no logged-on user, the property will be `null` and you will receive a compiler exception when attempting to cast the property as a object.
